title: On Site Courtesy Patrol and 24-Gym - The New You!
posting_body: Mediterranean Village Apartments is nestled amidst trees, a koi pond and beautiful landscaping, making it the perfect hideaway to call your home.
We offer a variety of units such as efficiencies, studios, one- and two-bedrooms floor plans.
With wood-look flooring, mirrored oversized closets that provide ample room for storage and your very own private patio or balcony offers a space for relaxing and unwinding in the fresh air.
Our ideal location places you in the heart of West Hollywood, conveniently located to the 405, 10, and 101 freeways.
- Courtyard setting with tropical landscape, fountains, and koi pond
- Walking distance to Melrose Avenue shopping district
- Walking distance to the Beverly Center
- Walking distance to Santa Monica and Sunset Boulevard’s dining and grocery shopping
- 2 miles from The Grove and The Farmers Market
- Conveniently located to the 405, 10, and 101 freeways
- On-site management available 7 days a week
- Full stainless-steel appliance package with gas range
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*On select units and new move-ins only.
